DialogueNode.prompt: Space inspection agent here, I demand an inspection of your ship under protocol E1974. You must halt and dock.

DialogueResponse.text: I am simply travelling by, I don't have anything of importance.
Your ship doesn't look like one of an inspection agent's... (it's got wearrrr all over). Also that protocol doesn't exist... meow.

DialogueNode.prompt: Are you refusing inspection? You are under arrest!
Are you questioning and refusing inspection? Halt now and dock!

DialogueResponse.text: You know, meow, you sound like a pirrrate...

DialogueNode.prompt: Ignorrring my commands is the worrrst decision you have made. Captain Waffles here will NOT tolerrrrate your arrrrogance!! I will take your ship and all your money with it!!

DialogueResponse.text: Ha, what money, I'm totally poor. (lie)
Ugh, just let me go. I don't have much.

DialogueNode.prompt: Bahahahahaha, you'rrre funny. I've scanned your ship already and you've got
Space inspection agent here, I demand an inspection of your ship under protocol E1974. You must halt and dock.

DialogueResponse.text: I am simply travelling by, I don't have anything of importance.
Your ship doesn't look like one of an inspection agent's... (it's got wear all over).
That protocol doesn't exist! (Attempt to run.)

DialogueNode.prompt: Are you refusing inspection? You are under arrest!
Wasn't that fun? Let's do it again.
